body.name: Listerine Ultraclean Oral Care Antiseptic Mouthwash, Everfresh Technology to Help Fight Bad Breath, Gingivitis, Plaque & Tartar, ADA-Accepted Oral Rinse, Cool Mint, 1 L, Pack of 2
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 3 hrs 41 mins
features: Twin pack of 1-Liter bottles of Listerine Ultraclean Cool Mint Antiseptic Gingivitis Treatment Mouthwash to fight tartar buildup & kill 99.9% of germs that cause bad breath, plaque & gingivitis &provide up to 3x longer lasting clean feeling versus brushing alone

This tartar control mouthwash in Cool Mint flavor has the benefits of original Listerine Antiseptic Mouthwash with an added tartar control ingredient for cleaner teeth, healthy gums & helps to keep your teeth naturally white

Daily oral rinse helps to achieve 4x healthier gums in 3 weeks vs. brushing alone by preventing tartar buildup & maintaining healthy gums for fresh breath & a dentist-clean, fresh feeling that lasts for hours
Listerine Whitening is no longer available. We recommend you try Listerine Ultraclean which helps keep your teeth naturally white
With approximately eight weeks of supply, achieve maximum results from this fresh breath mouthwash by rinsing mouth for 30 seconds twice a day, both morning & night, & experience a refreshing clean
body.description: Give your mouth a powerful, dentist-clean feeling with Listerine Ultraclean Antiseptic Mouthwash with refreshing Cool Mint flavor for gingivitis treatment. This oral care mouthwash is clinically proven to fight tartar buildup & kill 99.9% of germs that cause bad breath, plaque & gingivitis & provides up to 3x longer lasting clean feeling versus brushing alone. This tartar control mouthwash helps maintain healthy gums & fresh breath with an added anti-tartar ingredient for cleaner teeth & 4x healthier gums in 3 weeks vs. brushing alone. The Cool Mint flavor of the oral rinse combined with Listerine Everfresh technology will keep your breath fresh & your mouth feeling clean up to 3x longer than brushing alone. Accepted by the American Dental Association (ADA), achieve maximum results by rinsing with this mouthwash for 30 seconds twice a day. We recommend you try Listerine Ultraclean which helps keep your teeth naturally white.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: LISTERINE ANTISEPTIC LISTERINE ULTRACLEAN COOL MINT Antiseptic Mouthwash offers that long-lasting powerful dentist-clean feeling. With clinically proven ingredients to control tartar buildup and help keep your teeth naturally white. Just 30 seconds of rinsing twice a day provides 24-hour protection against plaque and gingivitis germs. LISTERINE ANTISEPTIC LISTERINE ULTRACLEAN COOL MINT Antiseptic Mouthwash offers that long-lasting powerful dentist-clean feeling. With clinically proven ingredients to control tartar buildup and help keep your teeth naturally white. Just 30 seconds of rinsing twice a day provides 24-hour protection against plaque and gingivitis germs. LISTERINE ANTISEPTIC LISTERINE ULTRACLEAN COOL MINT Antiseptic Mouthwash offers that long-lasting powerful dentist-clean feeling. With clinically proven ingredients to control tartar buildup and help keep your teeth naturally white. Just 30 seconds of rinsing twice a day provides 24-hour protection against plaque and gingivitis germs.

HEALTHIER GUMS Rinsing with LISTERINE ULTRACLEAN COOL MINT Antiseptic Mouthwash gets 4x healthier gums in just 3 weeks, according to a clinical study. A DEEPER CLEAN LISTERINE ULTRACLEAN COOL MINT Antiseptic Mouthwash includes EVERFRESH technology for a powerful dentist-clean feeling that lasts for hours. PROTECT AGAINST TARTAR BUILDUP LISTERINE ULTRACLEAN is formulated with zinc chloride, which controls tartar buildup, helping keep your teeth naturally white. #1 DENTIST RECOMMENDED BRAND Be sure to schedule appointments with your dentist at least every 6 months. Don't be shy to ask your dentist/hygienist about best oral care habits.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: If my mouth could high-five, it would thank me for introducing it to Listerine Ultraclean! This mouthwash isn't just a routine swish-and-spit; it's a superhero cape for your oral hygiene.I've tried a plethora of mouthwashes claiming to be tough on germs, but this one truly delivers. The minty-fresh explosion upon swishing wakes up my senses faster than my morning coffee. And let me tell you, it's like a mini spa day for my mouth!What sets Ultraclean apart is its knack for leaving my breath feeling fresher than a morning breeze while zapping away those pesky germs hiding in the nooks and crannies of my mouth. The "antiseptic" part? It's not just a buzzword—it's the real deal.I appreciate how it doesn't feel like it's attacking my taste buds or leaving behind an overpowering aftertaste. Instead, it's a perfect balance, leaving my mouth feeling clean, my breath smelling fresh, and my confidence soaring.Plus, I've noticed a significant improvement in my overall oral health. Sayonara, plaque! So long, bacteria! With regular use, my dentist even noticed the positive change during my last check-up.To all those seeking a mouthwash that's more than just minty water, Listerine Ultraclean is the ultimate sidekick for a superhero-level clean. Trust me; your mouth will thank you later!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Helps with plaque
reviews.reviewText: Works well. After using this for months, at my semi annual cleaning , my hygienist remarked on less plaque than on previous visits. Would definitely purchase again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Dental Hygienist Recommended
reviews.reviewText: My dental hygienist recommended that I use this before every brushing, so I do.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My breath no longer stinks
reviews.reviewText: When using this product with a regular brush routine you can’t go wrong.. no more stink breath ;) get some and people won’t run away when you open your mouth..

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good Price for a Necessity
reviews.reviewText: Both my husband and I use Listerine daily, so we are familiar with the product. I was looking for a better than usual price and found it here. It's convenient to purchase through Prime.
